Title: Samsung burning to regain trust with results of Note 7 fires probe
Body: SEOUL, Jan 23 Samsung Electronics Co Ltd plans on Monday to reveal reasons behind thespontaneous combustion of its recalled Galaxy Note 7, as theworld's biggest smartphone maker works to regain consumer trustbefore launching its next premium model.

Title: Samsung Elec Q4 profit jumps as record chip profit masks Note 7 failure,BRIEF-Imint signs development agreement with Samsung Electronics, South Korea,Samsung says batteries caused Note 7 fires, may delay new phone launch,UPDATE 4-Samsung says batteries caused Note 7 fires, may delay new phone launch,Samsung Electronics won't unveil Galaxy S8 smartphone at MWC show: executive,Samsung Electronics says battery defects caused Note 7 fires

Title: Samsung Elec to supply Exynos processors for Audi vehicles
Body: SEOUL, Jan 18 Tech giant Samsung Electronics COLtd said on Wednesday it will start supplyingVolkswagen's Audi with Exynos processors for thecarmaker's infotainment systems, expanding its chip sales forthe auto business.

Title: Fitch: Samsung Arrest Negative for Image but Credit Stays Intact
Body: (The following statement was released by the rating agency)SEOUL/SINGAPORE, February 20 (Fitch) The arrest of the heirapparent to the Samsung conglomerate, Lee Jae-yong, is unlikely to disrupt thecompany's day-to-day operations or significantly undermine its strongfinancial performance, which is underpinned by Samsung's market dominanceand technology leadership, says Fitch Ratings. However, the arrest is likely todelay strategic investment and weigh on investor sentiment, at least in

Title: Federal Circuit punts on Apple v. Samsung retrial question
Body: A federal appeals court has instructed the trial judge inApple Inc.___s long-running patent fight with Samsung ElectronicsCo to decide whether a retrial on the issue of damages isnecessary to address legal issues raised by the U.S. SupremeCourt.

Body: * The Weather Company and Lyft collaborate to providepersonalized recommendations for made for samsung app users,April 11 Australian shares extended gains for athird straight session on Tuesday, hitting a fresh two-yearhigh, as a rally in global oil prices continued to push energystocks higher.,SYDNEY/LONDON BHP Billiton on Monday rejected a plan by activist shareholder Elliott Advisors to scrap the miner's dual company structure, split off its oil business and return more cash to investors, saying the costs would outweigh any benefits.

Title: Samsung Electronics to invest $300 million for U.S. appliances factory: Korea Economic Daily,RPT-CORRECTED-Samsung Elec to invest $300 mln for U.S. appliances factory - Korea Economic Daily,CORRECTED-Samsung Elec to invest $300 mln for U.S. appliances factory - Korea Economic Daily
Body: SEOUL Tech giant Samsung Electronics Co Ltd plans to invest $300 million to build an appliances factory in the United States, the Korea Economic Daily reported on Thursday citing unnamed sources.,SEOUL, June 8 Tech giant Samsung Electronics CoLtd plans to invest $300 million to build anappliances factory in the United States, the Korea EconomicDaily reported on Thursday citing unnamed sources.,SEOUL, June 8 Tech giant Samsung Electronics CoLtd plans to invest $300 million to build anappliances factory in the United States, the Korea EconomicDaily reported on Thursday citing unnamed sources.

Title: Samsung Electronics plans Galaxy Note 8 launch event for August: source,UPDATE 1-Samsung Electronics plans Galaxy Note 8 launch event for August -source
Body: SEOUL Tech giant Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  plans to hold a launch event in New York City for its next Galaxy Note smartphone in the second half of August, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.,* Note 8 to have two rear cameras, larger curved screen-source

Title: High court signals interest in Apple-Samsung patent fight
Body: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday invited the actingsolicitor general to weigh in on the $120 millionpatent-infringement litigation between Apple and SamsungElectronics, a move that generally indicates that the justicesare interested in the case.

Title: Samsung announces new U.S. plant ahead of Trump summit with Moon,UPDATE 4-Samsung announces new U.S. plant ahead of Trump summit with Moon
Body: SEOUL Samsung Electronics Co Ltd said it will open its first U.S. appliances plant in more than three decades, a politically pleasing investment ahead of South Korean leader Moon Jae-in's two-day summit with U.S. President Donald Trump.,* Plant investment of $380 mln, will create almost 1,000jobs

Title: BRIEF-Discover Financial Services says Discover cardmembers can make payments in U.S. with Samsung Pay ___,U.S. antitrust lawsuit against Qualcomm to proceed, judge rules,U.S. antitrust lawsuit against Qualcomm to proceed, judge rules
Body: * Discover Financial Services - __Discover cardmembers cannow make payments in U.S. Using Samsung Pay on latest SamsungGalaxy smartphones and wearables___Source text for Eikon:Further company coverage:,The Federal Trade Commission's antitrust lawsuitagainst Qualcomm Inc can proceed, a federal judge ruledlate on Monday, meaning the iPhone chip supplier must now wage afight with U.S. regulators even as it contests a separate $1billion lawsuit filed by Apple Inc.,June 27 The Federal Trade Commission's antitrustlawsuit against Qualcomm Inc can proceed, a federaljudge ruled late on Monday, meaning the iPhone chip suppliermust now wage a fight with U.S. regulators even as it contests aseparate $1 billion lawsuit filed by Apple Inc.

Title: Samsung Electronics to launch refurbished Note 7 phones in South Korea from July 7,Samsung Electronics to launch refurbished Note 7 phones in S.Korea from July 7
Body: SEOUL Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  said on Sunday it will start selling a refurbished version of the recalled Galaxy Note 7 smartphone in South Korea on July 7, using batteries different from those that caused some handsets to catch fire last year.,SEOUL, July 2 Samsung Electronics Co Ltdsaid on Sunday it will start selling a refurbishedversion of the recalled Galaxy Note 7 smartphone in South Koreaon July 7, using batteries different from those that caused somehandsets to catch fire last year.

Title: Samsung on track to take Intel's chip crown with record Q2 earnings,Samsung plans $18.6 billion South Korea investment to widen chip lead,UPDATE 3-Samsung plans $18.6 bln S.Korea investment to widen chip lead,BRIEF-Sun Pharmaceutical Industries announces manufacturing tie-up with Samsung Biologics,Samsung Elec says to invest $18.6 bln in S.Korea for chips, displays
Body: SEOUL, July 5 Samsung Electronics Co Ltdis expected to report its best-ever quarterly profitin the second quarter, with soaring memory chip sales pushing itpast Intel Corp as the biggest semiconductor maker byrevenue for the first time.,SEOUL Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  said on Tuesday it will invest at least $18.6 billion in South Korea to extend its lead in memory chips and next-generation smartphone displays, in a plan that promises to create almost half a million jobs. |__,* To also add NAND production line in China(Adds analyst comments, context),* Strategic manufacturing tie-up with Samsung Biologics forTildrakizumab,SEOUL, July 4 Samsung Electronics Co Ltdsaid on Tuesday it plans to invest at least 21.4trillion won ($18.62 billion) in South Korea to raise output ofchips and displays, seeking to boost momentum for its boomingcomponents businesses.

Title: Samsung on track to take Intel's chip crown with record second-quarter earnings
Body: SEOUL Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  is expected to report its best-ever quarterly profit in the second quarter, with soaring memory chip sales pushing it past Intel Corp  as the biggest semiconductor maker by revenue for the first time.

Title: Samsung Electronics tips record second-quarter profit as memory prices surge,UPDATE 2-Samsung Elec tips record Q2 profit as memory prices surge
Body: SEOUL Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  on Friday said its second-quarter operating profit likely rose 72 percent from a year earlier to a new record, beating analyst estimates, as strong memory chip prices helped widen margins. |__,* Q2 op profit likely $12.1 bln vs $11.3 bln analystestimate

Title: Samsung Electronics says Q2 operating profit likely rose 72 pct y/y,Qualcomm accuses Apple of infringing six patents in iPhone, iPad,Qualcomm accuses Apple of infringing six patents in iPhone, iPad,UPDATE 3-Qualcomm accuses Apple of infringing six patents in iPhone, iPad
Body: SEOUL, July 7 Samsung Electronics Co Ltdon Friday said its second-quarter operating profitlikely rose 72 percent from a year earlier to a new record,beating analyst estimates, as strong memory chip prices helpedwiden margins.,WASHINGTON Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc willask the U.S. International Trade Commission to bar Apple Incfrom selling some iPhones and iPads in the UnitedStates that use chips made by competitor Intel Corp onthe grounds that the devices infringe on six Qualcomm patents.,WASHINGTON Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc  will ask the U.S. International Trade Commission to bar Apple Inc  from selling some iPhones and iPads in the United States that use chips made by competitor Intel Corp  on the grounds that the devices infringe on six Qualcomm patents.,WASHINGTON, July 6 Chipmaker Qualcomm Incwill ask the U.S. International Trade Commission to barApple Inc from selling some iPhones and iPads in theUnited States that use chips made by competitor Intel Corpon the grounds that the devices infringe on sixQualcomm patents.

Title: Samsung, America Movil announce partnership in Latin America,UPDATE 1-Samsung, America Movil announce partnership in Latin America,Samsung, America Movil announce partnership in Latin America,Samsung Elec to recover rare metals from recalled Note 7s,Samsung Elec to recover rare metals from recalled Note 7s
Body: MEXICO CITY Samsung Electronics Co Ltd and America Movil, the telecoms company controlled by Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim, said on Tuesday they had signed an agreement to provide the latest technology to Latin American consumers.,MEXICO CITY, July 18 Samsung Electronics Co Ltdand America Movil, the telecoms companycontrolled by Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim, said on Tuesdaythey had signed an agreement to provide the latest technology toLatin American consumers.,MEXICO CITY, July 18 Samsung Electronics Co. andAmerica Movil, the telecoms company controlled by Mexicanbillionaire Carlos Slim, said in a joint statement on Tuesdaythey had signed an agreement to provide the latest technology toLatin American consumers.,SEOUL Tech giant Samsung Electronics Co Ltd said on Tuesday it plans to recover 157 tonnes' worth of rare metals from recalled Galaxy Note 7 smartphones in a bid to minimize the environmental impact of the fire-prone devices.,SEOUL, July 18 Tech giant Samsung Electronics CoLtd said on Tuesday it plans to recover 157 tonnes'worth of rare metals from recalled Galaxy Note 7 smartphones ina bid to minimise the environmental impact of the fire-pronedevices.

Title: Nokia appoints Samsung executive as head of Technologies
Body: HELSINKI, June 30 Nokia has appointedsenior Samsung executive Gregory Lee as head of itsTechnologies unit and member of the group leadership team, thetelecoms network equipment maker said on Friday.

Body: * Global demand helped lift manufacturing but domesticdemand slow
